member.name: T:PSSharp.AsyncExtensions.IAwaitable
member.summary: Exposes an awaiter, which can be used to asynchronously wait for an operation to complete.

member.name: M:PSSharp.AsyncExtensions.IAwaitable.GetAwaiter
member.summary: Returns an awaiter that can be used to wait for the operation to complete.
member.returns: An awaiter that can be used to wait for the operation to complete.

member.name: T:PSSharp.AsyncExtensions.IAwaitable`1
member.summary: Exposes an awaiter, which can be used to asynchronously wait for an operation to complete and return a result of type .
member.typeparam: The type returned by the operation.

member.name: M:PSSharp.AsyncExtensions.IAwaitable`1.GetAwaiter
member.summary: Returns an awaiter that can be used to wait for the operation to complete and retrieve the result.
member.returns: An awaiter that can be used to wait for the operation to complete.

member.name: T:PSSharp.AsyncExtensions.IAwaiter
member.summary: Contract for an awaiter that waits for an operation to complete.

member.name: P:PSSharp.AsyncExtensions.IAwaiter.IsCompleted
member.summary: Indicates whether the operation has completed.

member.name: M:PSSharp.AsyncExtensions.IAwaiter.GetResult
member.summary: Throws an exception if the operation failed.

member.name: T:PSSharp.AsyncExtensions.IAwaiter`1
member.summary: Contract for an awaiter that waits for an operation to complete and returns a value.

member.name: M:PSSharp.AsyncExtensions.IAwaiter`1.GetResult
member.summary: Retrieves the result or throws an exception if the operation failed.
